header.title: ct_master

erlref.modulesummary: Distributed test execution control for Common Test.

description.p: Distributed test execution control for Common Test.
This module exports functions for running Common Test nodes on multiple hosts in parallel.

func.name: basic_html(Bool) -> ok
func.fsummary: If set to true, the ct_master logs are written on a primitive HTML format, not using the Common Test CSS style sheet.

desc.p: If set to true, the ct_master logs are written on a primitive HTML format, not using the Common Test CSS style sheet.

func.name: get_event_mgr_ref() -> MasterEvMgrRef
func.fsummary: Gets a reference to the Common Test master event manager.

desc.p: Gets a reference to the Common Test master event manager. The reference can be used to, for example, add a user-specific event handler while tests are running.
Returns test progress. If Status is ongoing, tests are running on the node and are not yet finished.

func.name: run(TestSpecs, InclNodes, ExclNodes) -> ok
func.fsummary: Equivalent to run(TestSpecs, false, InclNodes, ExclNodes).

desc.p: Equivalent to ct_master:run(TestSpecs, false, InclNodes, ExclNodes).

func.name: run(TestSpecs, AllowUserTerms, InclNodes, ExclNodes) -> ok
func.fsummary: Tests are spawned on the nodes as specified in TestSpecs.

desc.p: Tests are spawned on the nodes as specified in TestSpecs. Each specification in TestSpec is handled separately. However, it is also possible to specify a list of specifications to be merged into one specification before the tests are executed. Any test without a particular node specification is also executed on the nodes in InclNodes. Nodes in the ExclNodes list are excluded from the test.

func.name: run_on_node(TestSpecs, AllowUserTerms, Node) -> ok
func.fsummary: Tests are spawned on Node according to TestSpecs.

desc.p: Tests are spawned on Node according to TestSpecs.

func.name: run_test(Node, Opts) -> ok
func.fsummary: Tests are spawned on Node using ct:run_test/1.

type.v: OptTuples = {config, CfgFiles} | {dir, TestDirs} | {suite, Suites} | {testcase, Cases} | {spec, TestSpecs} | {allow_user_terms, Bool} | {logdir, LogDir} | {event_handler, EventHandlers} | {silent_connections, Conns} | {cover, CoverSpecFile} | {cover_stop, Bool} | {userconfig, UserCfgFiles}

desc.p: Tests are spawned on Node using ct:run_test/1
